title: Invalid Ticket Blocked 8 Agents (7 Dev + 1 QA)
issue: TKT-064 appears to be an 'explain this to me' request rather than an implementation ticket. It lacks all required specifications per Dev Agent SOP 1.2, yet 8 agents were assigned to it.

evidence.commit_history: Only blocker confirmations, no actual implementation

root_cause: PM routing bug - ticket was 'explain this to me' request from human, not an implementation request. Should not have been converted to dev ticket.
qa_recommendation: CLOSE TKT-064 AS INVALID - Human already got explanation they requested

human_decisions_required.label: Close as Invalid (Recommended)
human_decisions_required.description: Mark TKT-064 as invalid/closed. Human already received explanation.

human_decisions_required.label: Create New Ticket with Proper Specs
human_decisions_required.description: If work IS actually needed, create NEW ticket with proper files_to_modify, approach, testable AC

human_decisions_required.label: Fix PM Routing Logic
human_decisions_required.description: Prevent future routing of explanation-only requests to dev agents
human_decisions_required.action: Add validation to check blocker files before re-assigning tickets

impact: HIGH - Wasted 8 agent sessions, ongoing waste if not fixed
process_improvement_needed: PM must check docs/agent-output/blocked/ before assigning tickets, especially after multiple blocks
